original_text: The men who were travelling with Saul stood still. They could not say anything. They could hear that someone was speaking. But they could not see anyone.
korean_text: 같이 가던 사람들은 소리만 듣고 아무도 보지 못하여 말을 못하고 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: The men who were travelling with Saul

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아무 말도 할 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: But they could not see anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 아무도 볼 수 없었다
